Tool Description (Application): I can calculate Adjusted Covered Taxes by correctly classifying tax types and applying timing adjustments to reconcile financial statement taxes with GloBE requirements.

Tool Description (Application): I have completed end-to-end ETR calculations using the three-step process: ETR computation, SBIE application with transition rates, and top-up tax determination.

Course Description (Knowledge): I understand how GloBE rules apply to M&A transactions, joint ventures, multi-parented groups, and investment entities, including the transition adjustments required when entities enter or exit an MNE group.
Tool Description (Application): I can model the Pillar Two impact of corporate restructurings and handle mid-year acquisitions or disposals in GloBE calculations.

Course Description (Knowledge): I can evaluate whether a jurisdiction qualifies for Transitional CbCR Safe Harbour relief using the three tests: De Minimis, Simplified ETR, and Routine Profits.
Tool Description (Application): I have assessed jurisdictions against Safe Harbour criteria and determined which entities can benefit from simplified reporting in the transition period.

Course Description (Knowledge): I understand the GIR filing timeline including the standard 15-month deadline and the 18-month transitional extension for first filings, plus jurisdiction-specific variations.
Tool Description (Application): I can determine accurate filing deadlines for any jurisdiction and fiscal year-end, accounting for transitional rules and local requirements.

Course Description (Knowledge): I understand the structure of the GloBE Information Return including all required data fields across the MNE Group Information, Safe Harbours, and GloBE Computations sections.
Tool Description (Application): I have completed practice GIR submissions with full data entry, validation checks, and error correction across all required sections.

Course Description (Knowledge): I can evaluate whether to make a Designated Filing Entity election, understanding the qualification criteria, filing obligations, and implications for surrogate filing arrangements.
Tool Description (Application): I have analysed DFE election scenarios and determined the optimal filing strategy based on group structure and jurisdictional requirements.

Course Description (Knowledge): I understand the documentation requirements to support GloBE positions, including evidence standards, audit trail requirements, and defensive documentation practices.
Tool Description (Application): I have prepared audit-ready documentation packages that meet GloBE compliance requirements and support positions taken in the GIR filing.
